## YieldRequest interface

The message that is sent from the underlying sandbox when script execution is yielded.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface YieldRequest extends GenericMessage<"yield"> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [GenericMessage](./scripthost-core.genericmessage.md)<!-- -->&lt;"yield"&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [correlationId](./scripthost-core.yieldrequest.correlationid.md) | string | Unique identifier of the message that caused script evaluation |
|  [written?](./scripthost-core.yieldrequest.written.md) | Map&lt;string, number&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Optionally includes the global variables that were written during script evaluation, before the current function call.<!-- -->The values of the provided map represents the version of the global scope that became current after the corresponding variable was last written.<!-- -->This property may be omitted unless the script is evaluated with the <code>track</code> option. |
